abstract: Haitian Pres Michel Martelly is pressing forward with a plan to reconstitute the Haitian military as a kind of national guard to supplement the weak national police; $95 million proposal calls for an initial force of 3,500 personnel to patrol the border and help control civil unrest.
snippet: President Michel Martelly is pressing forward with a plan to reconstitute the Haitian military to supplement the weak national police.
lead_paragraph: President Michel Martelly is pressing forward with a plan to reconstitute the Haitian military to supplement the weak national police.

headline.main: Haitians Train for a Future With a Military
headline.print_headline: Haitians Train for a Future With a Military
headline.seo: President Michel Martelly Seeks to Re-create Haiti’s Army
